verses.name: Job 17:12
verses.text: They change the night into day: the light is short because of darkness.

verses.name: Job 17:13
verses.text: If I wait, the grave is mine house: I have made my bed in the darkness.

verses.name: Job 17:14
verses.text: I have said to corruption, Thou art my father: to the worm, Thou art my mother, and my sister.

verses.name: Job 17:15
verses.text: And where is now my hope? as for my hope, who shall see it?

verses.name: Job 17:16
verses.text: They shall go down to the bars of the pit, when our rest together is in the dust.
